00024 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00025 /// CTreeView
00026 ///
00027 /// @description  This class contains the graph and trace views used while
00028 ///               working on a tree style dataset. It lays out the two
00029 ///               views as a QSplitter to give the user control of each one's
00030 ///               size. By default the QSplitter holds the views as
00031 ///               non-collapsible and so it is recommended that the programmer
00032 ///               connect toggle actions to show/hide the views through the
00033 ///               connectGraphAction and connectTraceAction functions.
00034 ///
00035 /// @limitations  None
00036 ///
00037 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00038 class CTreeView : public IGNATView
00039 {
00040     Q_OBJECT
00041 
00042 public:
00043     CTreeView( QWidget *parent = 0 );
00044     ~CTreeView();
00045 
00046     void connectGraphAction( QAction *action );
00047     void connectTraceAction( QAction *action );
00048 
00049     void loadFromFile( const QString &filename );
00050     void saveImage( const QString &fileName );
00051     void saveToFile( const QString &filename );
00052 
00053  void signalRepaint(void);
00054 
00055 protected slots:
00056     void quickEditOff();
00057     void switchOrientation();
00058 
00059 private:
00060     void setupToolBar();
00061 
00062     QAction *m_quickEditAction;
00063 
00064     ///This variable stores a pointer to the tree graph view.
00065     CTreeGraphView *m_graphView;
00066 
00067     ///This variable stores a pointer to the tree trace view.
00068     CTreeTraceView *m_traceView;
00069 };
00070 
00071 #endif /*_CTREEVIEW_H_*/
